QuestData.Title: Removing the Paper Trail
QuestData.Description: This box is filled with writings and diagrams that oddly resemble research into the nullification of magic. It would be best to ruin these efforts by destroying any research found.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Boxes of Ogre Research at Mar'gok's Overwatch.
QuestData.RewardText: Burning magical paper smells pretty bad! Good thinking $p, keeping these ogres dumb is a solid plan!
